H0.text: What machine devised to move people was first demonstrated in Paris in 1900. Elevator

H1.text: What machine devised to move people was first demonstrated in Paris in 1900. Funicular

H2.text: What machine devised to move people was first demonstrated in Paris in 1900. Cable Car

H3.text: What machine devised to move people was first demonstrated in Paris in 1900. Escalate

A4.text: It won first prize at the 1900 Paris Exposition Universelle.

A5.text: Seeberger teamed with Otis in 1899, and together they produced the first commercial escalator.

A6.text: Illustrated description of escalators on the London Underground and their advantages over lifts
